law.history: Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 170, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 209, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1994. â€“ Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 14, effective March 2, 1992. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. II, sec. 40, effective July 13, 1990. -- Repealed in part 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4384-2, 4384-3, 4384-4, 4384-9.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Superintendent of Public Instruction -- Location of office -- Traveling expenses -- Salary.
